title: What are the dimensions of the little liscense plates used on scooters like the Activa ?
selftext:
I'm trying to have one shipped to me and my friend needs dimensions to look for them.   
I remember seeing those mini plates that literally resembled mini versions of the plates used on cars

I didn't know who to ask and can't find anything online so if someone could reply with measurement, it'd be much appreciated

Thanks !

https://preview.redd.it/kqwcsyalk43b1.png?width=684&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=0c82475c92d5d246c85f95cfee96d9170a249d56
